nodes.text: Girodyne was a company that produced sublight engines. Around thirty years after the Battle of Endor, the modified YT-1300 light freighter known as the Millennium Falcon was equipped with one of Girodyne's engines.

Girodyne was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Complete Cross-Sections, which was written by David West Reynolds and Curtis Saxton for publication in 2007. The company was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections, written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
